players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is lying to us, he's the mafioso I investigated last night."
You: "I don't think Charlie is telling the truth about Bob, I think he's trying to distract us from his own guilt."
Charlie: "I'm telling the truth about Bob, I investigated him and found evidence that he's the mafioso. We should focus on catching the real killer."
Bob: "I'm not the mafioso, I swear. I was with Charlie last night and we were both in our rooms."
